member.name: WS_METADATA_ENDPOINT
member.summary: Information about a single endpoint that was read from metadata documents.

member.name: WS_METADATA_ENDPOINT.endpointPolicy
member.summary:
An opaque handle representing the policy of the endpoint.
This handle is good until the metadata object is freed or reset.

member.name: WS_METADATA_ENDPOINT.portName
member.summary: The WSDL port name of the endpoint, if available.

member.name: WS_METADATA_ENDPOINT.serviceName
member.summary: The WSDL service name of the endpoint, if available.

member.name: WS_METADATA_ENDPOINT.serviceNs
member.summary: The WSDL service namespace of the endpoint, if available.

member.name: WS_METADATA_ENDPOINT.bindingName
member.summary: The WSDL binding name of the endpoint, if available.

member.name: WS_METADATA_ENDPOINT.bindingNs
member.summary: The WSDL binding namespace of the endpoint, if available.

member.name: WS_METADATA_ENDPOINT.portTypeName
member.summary: The WSDL portType name of the endpoint, if available.

member.name: WS_METADATA_ENDPOINT.portTypeNs
member.summary: The WSDL portType namespace of the endpoint, if available.
